attributes.action: Stop the payment of Maternity Grants to people who conceive after they have become unemployed.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
The Sure Start Maternity Grant should not be paid to claiments who have conceived after they became unemployed.

If the claiment conceived whilst on long term benefits then they should be ineligible to receive the £500 grant.

Many people assess whether they can afford to have a child before they do so. People who are on Income support or Jobseekers Allowance should not be paid these grants for failing to be responsible in their family planning.
